statements: UPDATE user_permissions SET permission_level = 3, access_control = 'full_access' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_permissions SET access_control = 'read_only', permission_level = 1 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_permissions SET access_control = 'granted' WHERE user_id = 123 AND permission_level > 2;
UPDATE user_permissions SET permission_level = 5, access_control = 'denied' WHERE user_id = 456;
